description: This Java source file defines a REST controller 'NoteController' that exposes CRUD endpoints for managing notes. It handles creating, listing with optional pagination, retrieving by ID, updating, and deleting notes through HTTP requests. The class interacts with a 'NoteService' and uses Data Transfer Objects (DTOs) and mapping utilities for request and response payloads.

classes.name: NoteController
classes.description: A REST controller providing endpoints to create, read, update, and delete notes. It maps to '/api/notes' and uses Spring annotations for request handling and API documentation.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new note, returning the created note with a 201 status and Location header.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list notes, supporting optional pagination parameters.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a note by its ID.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to update an existing note by ID.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove a note by ID.
